content:
In that case, you can modify the allergen disclaimer to reflect the specific ingredients that are present in your products. Here is an example:

"Allergen Disclaimer: Our products contain gluten, sesame seeds, eggs, and poppy seeds, which are known to cause allergies or intolerances. We take reasonable precautions to avoid cross-contamination, but we cannot guarantee the absence of these allergens in our products. Customers with allergies or intolerances to these ingredients are responsible for checking the ingredient labels and assessing the suitability of our products for their individual needs."

Again, please note that the exact wording and content of your terms of service may depend on the specific laws and regulations in California, and you may want to consult with a legal professional to ensure that your terms comply with applicable laws and regulations.
